about_the_game: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers. So whether your an expert platformer or new to the genre. You're sure to have grand old time.
detailed_description: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers. So whether your an expert platformer or new to the genre. You're sure to have grand old time.
name: A Stupidly Realistic Medieval War Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8/9/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Later/ AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or Later/ AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8/9/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Later/ AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or Later/ AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers.
